settings.heading: Power Packed Ingredients That Promote Hair Growth

settings.question: Will Traya work for me?
settings.answer: Yes, based on the information provided by you, we believe that a case like yours can show good results. Traya’s online hair diagnosis has helped more than 1,00,000 customers find the root cause of their hair loss and documented visible results to those who followed the treatment plan for more than 5 months. Once you buy the plan, Traya doctors evaluate your case. If they feel the treatment will not help you, a refund will be initiated immediately.

settings.question: When will I see results with Traya?
settings.answer: It takes 6-7 months on an average to see complete improvement. However, you may start to notice improved gut health, reduced dandruff and reduced hair fall in the first 3 months. The desired results can only be achieved when all products from the kit are used as prescribed by doctors.

settings.question: What is in your Traya kit?
settings.answer: Your Traya kit contains a mix of Ayurveda and Dermatology products along with a prescription sheet signed by doctors who overlook your case. You will be sent a diet plan digitally, which your assigned hair coach will explain to you.

settings.question: How is your Traya plan curated?
settings.answer: Once the combo has been purchased, doctors will look into your profile and prescribe a customized plan. This plan will be shipped to you in 2-5 business days. Upon receiving your combo, a hair coach will connect with you and guide you throughout the journey. Your personal hair coach will also send the diet plan and any notes mentioned by the doctors.

settings.question: Why Traya uses three sciences ?
settings.answer: At Traya we believe that a holistic treatment plan for hair loss works. Dermatology alone fails to address all the root causes of hair fall. Ayurveda helps understand why you have hair fall and heals from within. The focus here is on improving internal health in order to improve your hair health. Nutrition or diet is important for hair growth which is why we are the only hair loss company that provides a diet plan as a hair loss treatment.

settings.question: What is Traya’s 5 month money back guarantee?
settings.answer: If you buy the complete recommended plan and use it regularly for 5 months and yet fail to see results, you will be eligible for the 5 month money back guarantee.

settings.faq_head: Things To Know Before You Start

settings.desc: My experience with tatva has been great so far. I have started to see regrowth from the past month and would like to continue with the treatment for better results. I have just placed my 4th order with them. They never fail to impress me. Thanks guys!

settings.name: uday panchal
settings.desc: I had severe dandruff and hair fall problem since so many years and tatva's treatment fixed my dandruff in just one month! Effectiveness of their treatment is truly surprising. I'm in my third month now and can see a considerable change in my hair too. Hair fall has stopped and there some new growth too.
